long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access the latest news, breaking Thank you for considering the News For You Too extension. 
Our extension will update your search settings and will change your new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing.

It contains links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by or in any way affiliated with our company or this product. 

Use the web search facility to search for file converters and more. You will also be prompted with quick-links to get access to the latest news for your consideration.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the News For You Too Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
 
Uninstall Instructions: https://www.foryoutoo.com/uninstall.htm
Terms of Use - https://www.foryoutoo.com/terms.htm
Policy - https://www.foryoutoo.com/policy.htm
Contact Us: http://www.foryoutoo.com/terms.htm#terms-contact

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
